about.title: About
about.subtitle: Designed to make restaurant reservations fair, transparent and effortless for both guests and venues.
about.headline: We make reservations smarter and safer.
about.description: Rezvix combines deposits, QR check-in and real-time occupancy tracking. Guests enjoy a smooth experience while venues keep full control over their night.

smartBooking.title: Smart booking flow
smartBooking.desc: Table, party size, date and time selections are suggested in line with the venue’s opening hours and capacity.

deposit.title: Deposit & reliability
deposit.desc: Reduces no-show risk for venues while giving guests confidence that their table is truly reserved.

qr.title: Fast QR check-in
qr.desc: Reservations are verified at the door by scanning a QR code and actual arrivals are recorded instantly.

transparency.title: Transparent performance
transparency.desc: Reservation history, cancellation rates and occupancy metrics are visible to venues in a single view.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: You can reach out to us so we can assist you as quickly and accurately as possible.
contact.emailDesc: You can send us an email for any questions, feedback, or support requests.
contact.moreInfoDesc: Soon you will find more information and support channels about Rezvix right here.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.subtitle: You can permanently delete your Rezvix account and related data.
deleteAccount.descriptionMain: When you delete your account, your reservation history and personal data will be removed permanently. Please make sure you have saved any important information before continuing.
deleteAccount.dataItemReservations: Your past and upcoming reservation records
deleteAccount.dataItemProfile: Your profile details and communication preferences
deleteAccount.dataItemAnalytics: Usage data that can be linked to your profile
deleteAccount.warningText: After your account is deleted, you will need to create a new account to sign in again with the same email address.
deleteAccount.successMessage: Your account and personal data have been successfully deleted.
deleteAccount.errorGeneric: An error occurred while deleting your account.

helpSupport.title: Help & Support
helpSupport.subtitle: Quickly review the most common questions about reservations, notifications and using the app.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: We have collected the most common topics for you.
faq.q1: How do I make a reservation?
faq.q2: How can I cancel my reservation?
faq.q3: How do I track the status of my reservation?
faq.q4: Why am I not receiving notifications?
faq.a1: With Rezvix you can quickly book tables at partner restaurants, securely pay any required deposit, and verify your reservation in seconds using a QR check-in.
faq.a2: You can track your reservation status, cancellations and check-in records on the reservation detail screen and via in-app notifications.
faq.a3: Cancellation rules may vary by restaurant. The policy shown while creating the reservation is the one that applies.
faq.a4: You can reach us through the Help & Support section in the app or by sending an email to our contact address.

tips.title: Quick Tips
tips.subtitle: Check these steps first to avoid most issues.
tips.item1: Make sure notification permission is granted and your internet connection is stable.
tips.item2: Ensure you are using the latest version of the Rezvix app.
tips.item3: If the issue continues, try closing and reopening the app or logging out and back in.

contact.title: Still need help?
contact.subtitle: You can reach out to us anytime. We’ll get back to you as soon as possible.

licenses.title: Open Source Licenses
licenses.subtitle: Rezvix relies on many open source libraries for performance, security and a smooth user experience.

section.overviewBody1: Rezvix is built on top of modern web and mobile open source libraries. These projects help us ship faster while keeping performance and security standards high.
section.overviewBody2: Below is a grouped overview of some of the main libraries used in the app and their license types. For full license texts, please refer to each project’s GitHub repository.
section.noteBody1: This list summarizes the most frequently used core libraries in the project. There may be additional helper packages and development tools in use.
section.noteBody2: All libraries are used in accordance with their own license terms. We respect the work of the maintainers and are grateful to the open source community.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. Below you can find details about how Rezvix collects, uses and protects your data.
privacy.usage_reservation: To manage your reservations and provide accurate service
privacy.usage_notifications: To send important updates and notifications
privacy.usage_security: To improve security and prevent misuse
privacy.sharing_restaurants: Reservation data may be shared with relevant restaurants
privacy.sharing_law: Data may be shared if required by law or for safety
privacy.retention_text: Your data is stored only as long as necessary for operational, legal and security requirements.
privacy.rights_text: You may request access, correction or deletion of your personal data at any time.
privacy.cookies_text: Rezvix uses essential cookies to improve performance and personalize your experience.
privacy.contact_text: You can contact us for any questions, feedback, or requests regarding our privacy policy.
privacy.disclaimer: This privacy policy may be updated periodically to improve transparency and compliance.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.subtitle: By using Rezvix, you agree to the following terms and conditions.
terms.accountText: You are responsible for keeping your account secure and your login details confidential. Any activity carried out via your account is deemed to be your responsibility. We recommend that you do not share your password with third parties.
terms.reservationsText1: Reservations are created based on date, time, party size and the specific policies of each restaurant. Some venues may require a deposit or a minimum spend.
terms.reservationsText2: Cancellation and modification rights are defined by each restaurant’s own policy. Please review the terms shown during the reservation flow carefully.
terms.prohibitedText: You may not use Rezvix for fraudulent, misleading, abusive or illegal purposes. Creating fake reservations, acting on behalf of others without permission, or abusing the system may result in permanent suspension of your account.
terms.liabilityText: Rezvix is not directly responsible for the content, quality or delivery of services offered by restaurants. Rezvix acts as an intermediary platform that facilitates the reservation process.
terms.changesText: These terms may be updated from time to time. Changes take effect as soon as they are published within the app. Your continued use of Rezvix after changes have been published constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.
terms.legalText1: This text is for general information only and does not constitute legal advice. You are expected to comply with all applicable local laws and regulations while using the app.
terms.legalText2: If you have any legal or contract-related questions about Rezvix, please reach out to us via the contact screen or by email.
terms.disclaimer: *This text is for informational purposes only and does not replace professional legal advice.
